title: STD's . . . Not just long distance phone calls
creator_credit: Wendy Thompson, Sabina Wynn and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
brief_description: An entertaining look at the ways in which sexually transmitted diseases are transmitted and how they can (mostly) be cured. Looks at what happens at an STD clinic and encourages the use of condoms to prevent STDs.
